com.chdryra.android.reviewer

Interface ReviewNode

  • All Superinterfaces:
    RDId.RDIdAble, Review
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ReviewNodeExpandable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ReviewComponent, ReviewNodeAlone

    public interface ReviewNode
extends Review
    Node representation of a review. Can add other reviews as children or as a parent allowing a structured representation of how reviews may relate to each other e.g. in a user review with sub-criteria or a meta review.
    See Also:
    ReviewComponent, ReviewTreeEditable
